title: Implement ExecutionEngine module
description: Submit transactions via ethers.js v6 provider, monitor confirmation, handle reverts, retry logic.

title: Monitoring & Analytics Dashboard
description: Phase 5c: Real-time monitoring dashboard, alerting, P&L analytics, historical trade analysis, and automated parameter tuning.

title: Fuzz testing campaign
description: 100k+ runs on all public functions. Invariant tests for: total supply conservation, profit validation, access control. Foundry fuzz + invariant testing.

title: Configure pre-commit hooks
description: Install gitleaks pre-commit hook from .pre-commit-config.yaml, verify it catches test secrets.

title: MEV protection tests
description: Test that transactions are not submitted to public mempool. Verify bundle construction. Integration tests for Flashbots and MEV Blocker.

title: Implement ProfitValidator contract
description: On-chain: verify minimum profit after gas + fees. Revert if unprofitable.
close_reason: ProfitValidator fully implemented with 19 passing tests - profit validation, event emission, edge cases, fuzz tests

title: Implement dry-run mode
description: Both on-chain (simulate without broadcast) and off-chain (log opportunities without executing). DRY_RUN=true by default.

title: Project Initialization
description: Set up Foundry and TypeScript projects with all tooling. Includes forge init, pnpm init, foundry.toml, package.json, tsconfig.json, vitest.config.ts, and pre-commit hooks.

title: Implement HealthMonitor module
description: Off-chain: bot wallet balance monitoring, P&L tracking, error rate alerting, uptime heartbeat.

title: Advanced Arbitrage Strategies
description: Phase 4: Multi-hop arbitrage (A→B→C→A), cross-protocol opportunities (lending rate arb), triangular arbitrage within single DEXs, dynamic slippage based on pool depth.

title: Manual security review
description: Line-by-line review of FlashloanExecutor, all adapters, safety module. Check: reentrancy, access control, input validation, flash loan callback safety.

title: Real-time monitoring dashboard
description: Web dashboard showing: bot status, active positions, P&L, gas spent, success rate. Real-time updates via WebSocket or SSE.

title: Initialize Foundry project
description: forge init, configure foundry.toml with remappings, solc version 0.8.20+, fork settings, gas report.

title: Security Audit Preparation
description: Comprehensive security audit of all smart contracts before mainnet deployment with real funds. Includes automated scanning, manual review, and formal verification of critical paths.

title: Basic Bot Infrastructure
description: TypeScript off-chain bot with price monitoring for two DEXs (Uniswap V3 + SushiSwap), opportunity detection, and transaction building using ethers.js v6.

title: Implement FlashloanExecutor contract
description: Entry point extending FlashloanReceiver. executeArbitrage() function, DEX adapter routing, profit validation.
close_reason: FlashloanExecutor fully implemented - 288 lines, multi-hop arbitrage, adapter routing, profit validation

title: Multi-hop arbitrage (3-hop paths)
description: Contract support for A→B→C→A routes through multiple DEX adapters. Graph-based path finding in bot. Requires multi-DEX adapter system to be complete.

title: Assembly optimization for swap routing
description: Inline assembly for DEX adapter calls on hot paths. Avoid ABI encoding overhead. Target measurable gas savings on swap execution paths.

title: Formal verification of profit validation
description: Prove that ProfitValidator correctly prevents unprofitable execution under all inputs. Use Foundry symbolic execution or Certora-style verification.

title: Create Solidity interfaces
description: IFlashloanExecutor.sol, IDEXAdapter.sol, IFlashloanReceiver.sol with NatSpec docs.

title: Implement FlashloanReceiver base contract
description: Abstract base implementing Aave V3 executeOperation callback. Access control, reentrancy guard.
close_reason: FlashloanReceiver fully implemented with 36 passing tests

title: Safety Systems
description: On-chain circuit breakers and off-chain safety parameters. Max gas price, max slippage, loss threshold circuit breaker, position size limits, dry-run mode.

title: Complete safety test setup in invariants
description: File: contracts/test/invariants/SafetyInvariants.t.sol - TODO: Deploy full contract stack

title: Complete Deploy.s.sol contract deployment
description: File: contracts/script/Deploy.s.sol - TODO stubs need implementation: CircuitBreaker, ProfitValidator, FlashloanExecutor, DEX Adapters, verification, logging

title: Gas Optimization
description: Phase 5a: Gas optimization for hot paths using inline assembly, storage packing, calldata optimization. Target: 20%+ gas reduction on swap execution.

title: Core Flashloan Contracts
description: Implement FlashloanReceiver base and FlashloanExecutor entry point with Aave V3 flash loan integration. Atomic execution of borrow-swap-repay cycle.

title: Advanced strategy fork tests
description: Fork tests for multi-hop, triangular, and cross-protocol strategies. Verify correctness and profitability on mainnet fork with real pool state.
close_reason: Fork testing complete - 33 tests validating real Aave V3, Balancer, Uniswap V2/V3 integration

title: Implement TransactionBuilder module
description: Encode FlashloanExecutor calldata, gas estimation with safety margin, EIP-1559 pricing, nonce management.

title: Implement BalancerAdapter
description: Solidity adapter for Balancer V2 Vault. Implements IDEXAdapter interface. batchSwap for weighted pools. Also enables Balancer flash loans (zero-fee alternative to Aave). FundManagement struct integration.

title: Implement UniswapV2Adapter
description: Solidity adapter for Uniswap V2 Router. Implements IDEXAdapter interface. swapExactTokensForTokens for execution, getAmountsOut for quoting. Supports most token pairs via factory-deployed pools.

title: MEV Protection
description: Phase 5b: MEV protection using Flashbots Protect, private mempools, MEV Blocker, and commit-reveal patterns. Prevent sandwich attacks on arbitrage transactions.

title: Strategy backtesting framework
description: Historical data replay to test strategy profitability. Record and analyze past block data. Simulate strategies against historical on-chain state.

title: Automated parameter tuning
description: Self-adjusting min profit threshold, gas ceiling, and slippage based on recent market conditions. ML-assisted or rule-based optimization.

title: DEX adapter gas benchmarks
description: Forge gas report comparing all 5 DEX adapters. Identify optimization opportunities. Compare gas costs per swap across adapters to inform routing decisions in the opportunity detector.

title: Implement CircuitBreaker contract
description: On-chain: max gas price check, max trade size, cumulative loss tracking with auto-halt. Pausable.
close_reason: CircuitBreaker fully implemented with 42 passing tests - pause/unpause, gas/trade limits, failure tracking

title: Write FlashloanExecutor fork tests
description: Fork tests against mainnet Aave V3 pool. Test real flash loan execution.

title: Flashbots Protect integration
description: Submit bundles via Flashbots relay. eth_sendBundle, bundle simulation, inclusion tracking. Primary MEV protection mechanism.

title: Implement bot entry point
description: src/index.ts main loop: connect to RPC, start price monitor, detect opportunities, execute trades. Graceful shutdown.

title: Advanced path optimization
description: Optimal split routing across multiple pools. Consider pool depth, fees, and gas costs for best execution. Route large trades across multiple paths for better prices.

title: Arbitrum deployment
description: Deploy contracts to Arbitrum One. Arbitrum-specific gas handling (L1 data fee), adapted adapter addresses. Arbiscan verification. Deploy after Ethereum mainnet proves contracts work.

title: Slither static analysis
description: Run Slither on all contracts. Fix all high/medium findings. Document accepted low findings with justification.

title: Storage packing optimization
description: Pack circuit breaker and config storage into minimal slots. Use uint128/uint96 where possible. Minimize SLOAD/SSTORE operations.

title: Calldata optimization
description: Minimize calldata size for L2 deployment (Arbitrum/Base where calldata = L1 gas cost). Efficient encoding for cross-chain cost reduction.

title: Cross-chain configuration
description: .env management per chain, chain-specific gas settings, provider URLs, contract addresses. Structured config that supports multiple chains cleanly.

title: Base deployment
description: Deploy contracts to Base. Base-specific considerations (OP Stack gas model), Basescan verification. Deploy after Ethereum mainnet proves contracts work.

title: Multi-Chain Support
description: Phase 3: Deploy and operate the arbitrage bot across Ethereum mainnet, Arbitrum, and Base. Chain-specific gas strategies, RPC management, and contract deployment per chain.

title: Multi-chain fork testing
description: Fork tests for Arbitrum and Base alongside Ethereum. Verify adapter compatibility per chain. Test chain-specific gas estimation and L1/L2 fee calculations.

title: Initialize TypeScript project
description: pnpm init, package.json with scripts (build, test, start, dev), tsconfig.json with strict mode, vitest.config.ts.

title: Write DEX adapter fork tests
description: Fork tests against mainnet for all 5 DEX adapters (UniV2, UniV3, SushiSwap, Curve, Balancer). Test real swaps with actual pool state. Verify correct token amounts, slippage handling, and revert conditions.

title: Write bot unit tests
description: Vitest tests for PriceMonitor, OpportunityDetector, TransactionBuilder, ExecutionEngine with mocked providers.

title: Install Foundry toolchain
description: Install Foundry (foundryup), verify forge/cast/anvil/chisel available. This is the very first step before any Solidity work.

title: Triangular arbitrage within single DEX
description: Detect and execute triangular arb within Uniswap V3 or Balancer multi-asset pools. Exploit price inconsistencies across related pairs on the same DEX.

title: Update OpportunityDetector for multi-DEX
description: Extend TypeScript OpportunityDetector to scan all 5 DEXs (UniV2, UniV3, SushiSwap, Curve, Balancer). Updated profit calculation with per-DEX fee structures. Cross-DEX price comparison for arbitrage detection.

title: Implement SushiSwapAdapter
description: Solidity adapter for SushiSwap Router (Uniswap V2 fork). Implements IDEXAdapter interface. Separate router addresses per chain. Same swap interface as UniV2 but different contract addresses.

title: Gas benchmark suite
description: Automated gas regression tests. Track gas per operation across commits. CI integration to catch gas regressions before merge.

title: Write FlashloanExecutor unit tests
description: Foundry tests: test_executeArbitrage, test_revertOnUnprofitable, test_accessControl, test_reentrancyGuard.

title: Performance benchmarking
description: Latency tracking: opportunity detection time, transaction submission time, confirmation time. Identify bottlenecks in the execution pipeline.

title: Multi-chain bot orchestration
description: Run separate monitoring loops per chain. Shared opportunity ranking across chains. Unified execution pipeline that routes to the correct chain's contracts.

title: Multi-DEX Adapter System
description: Phase 2: Implement pluggable DEX adapter pattern supporting Uniswap V2/V3, SushiSwap, Curve, and Balancer. Each adapter implements IDEXAdapter interface for standardized swap execution.

title: Implement UniswapV3Adapter
description: Solidity adapter for Uniswap V3 SwapRouter. Implements IDEXAdapter interface. exactInputSingle for execution, concentrated liquidity tick math for quoting, fee tier selection (500/3000/10000 bps).
close_reason: UniswapV3Adapter complete - 8.6KB, 27 tests, multi-hop with fee tier support

title: Dynamic slippage adjustment
description: Calculate optimal slippage based on pool liquidity depth and trade size. Avoid excessive slippage on thin pools. Adjust per-trade based on real-time pool state.

title: Private mempool support
description: Abstract MEV protection behind interface. Support multiple providers (Flashbots, MEV Blocker, etc.). Provider selection and fallback logic.

title: Implement PriceMonitor module
description: Monitor prices on Uniswap V3 and SushiSwap via ethers.js v6 multicall. WebSocket for Swap/Sync events.

title: Historical analytics
description: Trade history analysis: profit by DEX pair, gas efficiency over time, optimal trading hours, strategy performance comparison.

title: Chain-specific RPC management
description: TypeScript module for managing RPC connections per chain. Includes failover logic, health checks, latency tracking, and automatic provider rotation on failure.

title: Write safety contract tests
description: Unit + fuzz tests for CircuitBreaker and ProfitValidator. Test edge cases, overflow.

title: Update TransactionBuilder for multi-DEX routing
description: Encode swap routes that can use any adapter combination. Optimal path selection across DEXs. Build calldata for FlashloanExecutor that routes through multiple adapters in a single transaction.

title: Multi-DEX integration tests
description: End-to-end tests: detect opportunity across DEXs, build transaction, simulate execution on fork. Verify full pipeline from price detection through profitable execution with multi-DEX routing.

title: Implement CurveAdapter
description: Solidity adapter for Curve pools. Implements IDEXAdapter interface. exchange() for stablecoin pools, meta-pool support. Registry integration for pool discovery. Handles variable-length pools (2-4 tokens).

title: Alerting system
description: Alerts for: circuit breaker triggered, high error rate, low balance, gas spike, RPC failure. Support Email/Discord/Telegram notification channels.

title: Cross-protocol lending rate arbitrage
description: Detect rate discrepancies between Aave, Compound, and other lending protocols. Borrow low, lend high within a single flashloan transaction.

title: Ethereum mainnet deployment
description: Deploy FlashloanExecutor + all adapters to Ethereum mainnet via Foundry scripts. Full verification on Etherscan. Requires all integration tests passing and security audit complete.

title: Implement OpportunityDetector module
description: Cross-DEX price comparison for token pairs. Profit estimation factoring gas + fees + slippage. Min profit threshold.

title: MEV Blocker integration
description: Alternative MEV protection via MEV Blocker (CoW Protocol). Fallback when Flashbots unavailable. Secondary protection layer.
